text: The Karnataka State Film Awards 2011, presented by Government of Karnataka, to felicitate the best of Kannada Cinema released in the year 2011.(wrong link) ==Lifetime achievement award== {|class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Name of Award !style="background- color:#EFE4B0;"|Awardee(s) !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Awarded As |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |Dr. Rajkumar Award Puttanna Kanagal Award Dr. Vishnuvardhan Award |Hamsalekha D. Rajendra Babu Anant Nag |Music Director,Lyricist Director Actor |} == Jury == A committee headed by Sunil Kumar Desai was appointed to evaluate the feature films awards. == Film Awards == {|class="wikitable" style="width:100%;" |- !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Name of Award !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Film !style="background- color:#EFE4B0;"|Producer !style="background-color:#EFE4B0;"|Director |- style="background-color:#F4F4F4" |First Best Film |Prasad |Ashok Kheny |Manoj K.
